verses.name: Ezekiel 1:4
verses.text: And I looked, and, behold, a whirlwind came out of the north, a great cloud, and a fire infolding itself, and a brightness was about it, and out of the midst thereof as the colour of amber, out of the midst of the fire.

verses.name: Ezekiel 1:5
verses.text: Also out of the midst thereof came the likeness of four living creatures. And this was their appearance; they had the likeness of a man.

verses.name: Ezekiel 1:6
verses.text: And every one had four faces, and every one had four wings.
